text:
Arthur Davies (11 April 1941 –) was a Welsh tenor. He had an international performance career from the 1970s through the 1990s. He performed leading roles with The Royal Opera in London, the Welsh National Opera, the Scottish Opera, and the English National Opera.
Davies was born in Wrexham, Wales. He died in August 2018 at the age of 77. His death was announced on August 9.
